column4: Hello I have libstdc++6 package broken, and apt want to remove half of my system, what can I do, to repair it without deleting 1/2 of my system ?
when you get a wedged apt-get system like that sometimes you can rescue it by installing the package manually (dpkg -i)
if that's the broken package you could try that...
that was easy - sometimes those problems are a real PITA
